description: State appropriation from the Accountability Court Fund to the AOC for FY 2026. Act 776 appropriates $400,000 from the Accountability Court Fund for operating expenses and grants/aid to adult and juvenile specialty courts.  The Accountability Court Fund is a trust fund created by Ark. Code §19‑5‑1144 consisting of grants and other funds and is used by the AOC for specialty courts.
destination: Administrative Office of the Courts (operating expenses and grants for specialty courts)
